Element.Name: UBL VersionID
Element.Description: Identifies the UBL version on which the transaction instance is based.

Element.Name: Customization identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Profile identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Order identifier
Element.Description: A transaction instance must have an identifier. The identifier enables referencing the transaction for various purposes such as from other transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Order issue Date
Element.Description: The date on which the transaction instance was issued. Format YYYY-MM-DD

Element.Name: Order issue time
Element.Description: The time assigned by the buyer on which the order was issued.

Element.Name: Consignment order indication
Element.Description: "Indicates wether the order is a purchase order or consignement order. Default is purchase order.

Element.Name: Document level textual note
Element.Description: Free form text applying to the Order. This element may contain notes or any other similar information that is not contained explicitly in another structure.

Element.Name: Currency
Element.Description: The default currency for the order.

Element.Name: Buyers accounting string
Element.Description: Used by the buyer to specify a reference that should be repeated in e.g. invoice to enable the buyer to automatically book e.g. to the right project, or account.

Element.Name: Order validity end date
Element.Description: The end date for when the order is valid. The end date for the time period within which the seller must respond. Format YYYY-MM-DD.

Element.Name: Quotation document reference
Element.Description: Information about Quotation Document reference

Element.Name: Quotation document reference
Element.Description: A requirement to give a unique reference to the quotation that is the base for the order.

Element.Name: Order document reference
Element.Description: Information about order document reference

Element.Name: Order document reference
Element.Description: Used to reference the initial order that was rejected and a new order is issued.

Element.Name: Originator document reference
Element.Description: Information about originator document reference

Element.Name: Originator document reference
Element.Description: A reference to Originator Document. To be able to give a reference to the internal requesition on the buyer site on which the order is based.

Element.Name: Originator document description
Element.Description: Originator document description.

Element.Name: Additional document reference
Element.Description: Information about additional document reference

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the referenced document.

Element.Name: Document description
Element.Description: A short description of the document type.

Element.Name: Attachment
Element.Description: Information about attachment.

Element.Name: Attached binary object
Element.Description: The attached document embeded as binary object.

Element.Name: External reference
Element.Description: Information about external reference/URI.

Element.Name: External document URI
Element.Description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies where the external document is located.

Element.Name: Contract
Element.Description: Information about contact.

Element.Name: Reference identifier
Element.Description: Positive identification of the reference such as a unique identifier.

Element.Name: Reference type
Element.Description: The short description of what is reference such as contract type, document type , meter etc. The type of Contract, expressed as text.

Element.Name: Buyer
Element.Description: Information about buyer.

Element.Name: Buyer
Element.Description: Party information.

Element.Name: Buyer party endpoint identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the end point of the routing service.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example NO:ORGNR

Element.Name: pARTY Identification
Element.Description: Information about PartyID

Element.Name: Buyer party identifier
Element.Description: An identification for the buyer party.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example GLN.

Element.Name: Buyer party name
Element.Description: The name of the party who orders the listed items. Information about Party name.

Element.Name: Buyer party name
Element.Description: The name of the party who orders the listed items.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: Information about postal address.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number. An invoice must contain the seller‚Äôs street name and number or P.O.box.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post Code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text. In some countries regions or other type of country sub divisions are commonly used.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: Information about country.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: The country where the address is. The country should always be given by using ISO code 3166 alpha 2.

Element.Name: Tax scheme
Element.Description: Information about VAT.

Element.Name: Buyer VAT identifier
Element.Description: The buyers registered Value Added Tax identifier. To be stated in case reverse charge is to apply to the purchase.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example NO:VAT.

Element.Name: Tax scheme
Element.Description: Information about Tax scheme.

Element.Name: Identifier
Element.Description: =VAT

Element.Name: Legal entity
Element.Description: Information about Legal entity

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration name
Element.Description: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a company as registered with the company registration scheme.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example NO:ORGNR

Element.Name: Registration address
Element.Description: Information about Registration address.

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration address city name
Element.Description: Associates with the registered address of the party within a Corporate Registration Scheme. The name of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: Information about country.

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration address country code
Element.Description: Buyers legal registration address country ID.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Contact information.

Element.Name: Contact ID
Element.Description: Customer reference (‚ÄúYour ref‚Äù) to be returned in the Invoice, e.g.Employee-no.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact fax number
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact persons.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Seller
Element.Description: Information about seller.

Element.Name: Party
Element.Description: Party information.

Element.Name: Seller party endpoint identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the end point of the routing service.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example NO:ORGNR

Element.Name: Party Identification
Element.Description: Information about PartyID.

Element.Name: Seller party identifier
Element.Description: An identification for the seller party.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example GLN.

Element.Name: Seller party name
Element.Description: The name of the party. Information about Party name.

Element.Name: Seller party name
Element.Description: The name of the party who orders the listed items.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: Information about postal address.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post Code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: Information about country.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: The country where the address is. The country should always be given by using ISO code 3166 alpha 2.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Contact information.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact fax number
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact persons.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Originator customer party
Element.Description: Information about Originator

Element.Name: Originator
Element.Description: Originator information

Element.Name: Identification
Element.Description: Originator identification

Element.Name: Originating party identifier
Element.Description: The originator party identifier

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example GLN.

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: Information about party name

Element.Name: Originating party name
Element.Description: The originator party name.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Contact information.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact fax number
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact persons.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Customer
Element.Description: Customer party.

Element.Name: Party
Element.Description: Party information.

Element.Name: EndPointID
Element.Description: An order may contain the buyers electronic address. The address can be of any format and the format should be identified in the message.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example NO:ORGNR.

Element.Name: Identification
Element.Description: Information about PartyID.

Element.Name: Invoice party identification
Element.Description: An identification for the invoice party.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example GLN.

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: Information about Party name.

Element.Name: Invoice party name
Element.Description: The name of the party who should be invoiced for the ordered items.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: Address information.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post Code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text. In some countries regions or other type of country sub divisions are commonly used.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: The country where the address is. The country should always be given by using ISO code 3166 alpha 2.

Element.Name: Tax scheme
Element.Description: Information regarding tax.

Element.Name: Company ID
Element.Description: Identifies a company as registered with the company registration scheme.

Element.Name: Identifier
Element.Description: =VAT

Element.Name: Legal entity
Element.Description: Information regarding legal entity.

Element.Name: Legal registration name
Element.Description: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Element.Name: Legal registration identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a company as registered with the company registration scheme.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: Associates with the registered address of the party within a Corporate Registration Scheme. The name of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: Invoice legal registration address country ID.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Contact information.

Element.Name: Contact ID
Element.Description: Invoice contact identification.

Element.Name: Delivery
Element.Description: Delivery information

Element.Name: Delivery location
Element.Description: Information about delivery location.

Element.Name: Address
Element.Description: Address information.

Element.Name: Delivery location ID
Element.Description: An identifier for the location to where the ordered items should be delivered.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post Code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: Country information

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: The country where the address is. The country should always be given by using ISO code 3166 alpha 2.

Element.Name: Requested delivery period
Element.Description: Information about Requested Delivery period.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The date on which the period starts. The start dates counts as part of the period. Format YYYY-MM-DD.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The date on which the period ends. The end date counts as part of the period. Format YYYY-MM-DD.

Element.Name: Delivery party
Element.Description: Information about Delivery party

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: Information about PartyID.

Element.Name: Delivery party ID
Element.Description: An identifier for the party that should deliver the ordered items.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example GLN.

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: Information about party name.

Element.Name: Delivery party name
Element.Description: The name of the party that should handle the delivery.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact Telefax number
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact persons.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Delivery terms
Element.Description: Information about delivery terms.

Element.Name: Delivery terms
Element.Description: The ability for the buyer to specify what shipping terms should apply the delivery of the order.

Element.Name: Delivery special terms
Element.Description: A description of special conditions relating to the Delivery Terms.

Element.Name: Delivery terms location
Element.Description: An association to Location, e.g., a port. The unique identifier for the location.

Element.Name: Payment terms
Element.Description: Description of payment terms.

Element.Name: Payment terms
Element.Description: Description of the payment terms for the invoice which will be based on this order.

Element.Name: Allowance charge
Element.Description: Information about Allowances and charges.

Element.Name: Charge indicator
Element.Description: True or false

Element.Name: Allowance and charges reason
Element.Description: A textual reason for the allowance or the charge. Can also be its name.

Element.Name: Allowance and charge amount
Element.Description: The net amount of the allowance or the charge excluding VAT.

Element.Name: Tax total
Element.Description: Information about VAT total.

Element.Name: VAT total amount
Element.Description: The total VAT amount that is "added to the document total w/o VAT". This is the sum of all VAT subcategory amounts. An association to the total tax amount of the Order (as calculated by the Buyer). The expected Tax Total in the corresponding invoice. The total tax amount for particular tax scheme e.g. VAT; the sum of each of the tax subtotals for each tax category within the tax scheme. Sum of line tax amounts. An association to the total tax amount of the Order (as calculated by the Buyer). The expected Tax Total in the corresponding invoice

Element.Name: Anticipated monetary total
Element.Description: Information about expected totals.

Element.Name: Sum of line amounts
Element.Description: Sum of line amounts in the document. The total of Line Extension Amounts net of tax and settlement discounts, but inclusive of any applicable rounding amount.

Element.Name: Document total without VAT
Element.Description: The "Sum of line amounts" plus "sum of allowances on document level" plus "sum of charges on document level".

Element.Name: Document total including VAT
Element.Description: The total value including VAT.

Element.Name: Sum of allowances on document level
Element.Description: Sum of all allowances on header level in the document. Allowances on line level are included in the line amount and summed up into the "sum of line amounts".

Element.Name: Sum of charges on document level
Element.Description: Sum of all charge on header level in the document. Charges on line level are included in the line amount and summed up into the "sum of line amounts".

Element.Name: Paid amounts
Element.Description: Any amounts that have been paid a-priory.

Element.Name: Rounding of document level
Element.Description: Any rounding of the "Document total including VAT".

Element.Name: Amount for payment
Element.Description: The amount that is expected to be paid based on the document. This amount is the "Document total including VAT" less the "paid amounts" that have been paid a-priori. The total amount to be paid. Estimated total amount of order including VAT.

Element.Name: Order line
Element.Description: Order line information.

Element.Name: Order line note
Element.Description: Free-form text applying to the Order Line. This element may contain notes or any other similar information that is not contained explicitly in another structure. Is to capture any free form description related to the order line as a whole.

Element.Name: Document line identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the Line Item assigned by the buyer.

Element.Name: Ordered quantity
Element.Description: The quantity of Items for the Line Item. The quantity for the order line.

Attribute.Description: Must be a valid code in codelist UN/ECE Rec 20.

Element.Name: Order line amount
Element.Description: The total amount for the Line Item, including Allowance Charges but net of taxes. The expected line amount excluding VAT but inclusive of other charges, allowances and taxes.

Element.Name: Order line tax amount
Element.Description: The total tax amount for the Line Item. The total amounts of taxes on the line.

Element.Name: Partial Delivery Allowed Indicator
Element.Description: Indicates if the line items must be delivered in a single shipment. Default that partial delivery is allowed.

Element.Name: Requested delivery period
Element.Description: Information about Requested Delivery period.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The date on which the period starts. The start dates counts as part of the period. Format YYYY-MM-DD.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The date on which the period ends. The end date counts as part of the period. Format YYYY-MM-DD.

Element.Name: Originator party
Element.Description: Information about Originator.

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: Information about PartyID.

Element.Name: Order line originator party ID
Element.Description: The party who originated Order.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example GLN.

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: Information about party name.

Element.Name: Order line originator party name
Element.Description: The party who originated Order.

Element.Name: Price
Element.Description: Price information.

Element.Name: Item price
Element.Description: The net price of an item including discounts or surcharges that apply to the price. Although price is an optional element in an order it recommended as best practice to either state the price or provide reference to an appropriate source from which the price can be identified such as a contract, catalogue or a quote. The price amount. The net price of the item including all allowances, charges and taxes but excluding VAT.

Element.Name: Item price base quantity
Element.Description: The actual quantity to which the price applies.

Attribute.Description: Must be a valid code in codelist UN/ECE Rec 20.

Element.Name: Allowance Charge
Element.Description: Information regarding allowances and charges connected to price.

Element.Name: Allowance/Charge indicator
Element.Description: True = Charge, False = Allowance.

Element.Name: Amount
Element.Description: The total discount subtracted from the gross price to reach the net price.

Attribute.Description: MUST be coded using ISO code list 4217.

Element.Name: Item list price
Element.Description: The gross price of the item before subtracting discounts. E.g. list price.

Element.Name: Item
Element.Description: Item information.

Element.Name: Item description as text
Element.Description: Free-form field that can be used to give a text description of the item. A detailed description of the item. Use one description per language. Test text for capturing notes.

Element.Name: Item Name
Element.Description: A short name for an item. A short name optionally given to an item, such as a name from a Catalogue, as distinct from a description.

Element.Name: Sellers item identification
Element.Description: Information about Sellers ItemID.

Element.Name: Item sellers identifier
Element.Description: The sellers identifier for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the seller's system. The sellers ID for the item.

Element.Name: Standard item identification
Element.Description: Information about Standard ItemID.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: An item identifier based on a registered schema. Associates the item with its identification according to a standard system. Standarized ID for the item.

Element.Name: Item specification document reference
Element.Description: Reference to a document containing item specifications

Element.Name: Document reference
Element.Description: Reference to an external document (ID) when it is necessary to specify the details of the item.

Element.Name: Commodity classification
Element.Description: A classification code for classifying the item by its type or nature.

Element.Name: Item commodity classification
Element.Description: A classification code for classifying the item by its type or nature.

Element.Name: Tax category
Element.Description: Information about VAT.

Element.Name: Item VAT category code
Element.Description: The VAT code that indicates what VAT details apply to the item.

Element.Name: Item VAT rate
Element.Description: The VAT percentage rate that applies to the ordered item.

Element.Name: Tax scheme
Element.Description: Information about Tax scheme (VAT).

Element.Name: Identifier
Element.Description: =VAT

Element.Name: Additional properties
Element.Description: Information about Additional Item properties

Element.Name: Property name
Element.Description: The name of the property. The name must be sufficiently descriptive to define the value. The definition may be supplemented with the property unit of measure when relevant. E.g. Size, Color, Year.

Element.Name: Property value
Element.Description: The value of the item property. E.g. XXL, Blue, 2007.

Element.Name: Quantity
Element.Description: Quantity for the property.

Attribute.Description: Valid code according to code list UN/ECE Rec 20.

Element.Name: Qualification of qty
Element.Description: Description of quantity.
